TopicTitle: Toob Suite of Parts: Variable Section Becomes Seperated From Ring Section When Duplicated

Articles.Content:
No mods.

When TOOB parts are duplicated, their variable section often becomes separated from their ring section.  This offset can be duplicated with each copy.

The variable part seems to become offset from the ring part at the moment of duplication.  I can tell because I notice that when I hold alt and click the part I'm trying to copy, the duplicate part that appears attached to my cursor has the offset.

If nothing is attached to the variable end of the TOOB when it is being duplicated, the offset only seems to be applied to the first copy.

This seems to affect all TOOB sizes.

The attachment node of the duplicated TOOB whose variable section is now offset does not seem to become offset.  The parts do not become longer in this sense.

This happens when attaching in a linearly or radially.

The screenshot shows some examples of the offsetting.
